root.name: Aurora Feint II: The Arena
root.description: Now known as Aurora Feint II: Arena Daemons, it is similar to Trism and Bejeweled. You can play head to head duels as well as level your character up to level 60 in single player puzzle challenges. - Real-time asynchronous player vs. player dueling- Continuous personal news feed- A thriving multi-player community- Powerful new character classes- Player profiles with walls- Friend and global leaderboards- Unlock powerful Daemons by dueling- Each Daemon has a unique ability

similar_games.game: Puzzle Quest Chapter 1: Battle of Gruulkar
